modules.description: Handles signal interception and graceful shutdown sequences, with functions to register cleanup handlers and manage signal propagation. Operates on Lwt threads, signals, and resource management callbacks. Used to ensure database connections are closed and temporary files are removed when a process receives a termination signal.

Provides functions to register and manage clean-up callbacks, trigger soft exits with asynchronous termination, and handle signal-based shutdowns. Operates with promises, signal setups, and callback identifiers to coordinate resource release and process termination. Used to ensure graceful shutdowns in event loops, handle signals like SIGINT and SIGTERM, and manage error recovery with controlled exit codes.
